issue.title: [JS] Minimal predicate interface
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-12562](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-12562). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
It would be great to have a minimal predicate interface that someone can implement without having to support the full predicate interface with `and` and `or`.
